title: Dies after masturbating 42 times in a row
subtitle: The man had third degree burns in his hands caused by the friction of the palms with the penis.
text: All compulsive conduct can end in a tragic end. This is what happened to a young Brazilian who lost his life after masturbating 42 times consecutively. The marathon session that would end with the boy began at midnight and did not stop until after sunrise.

The authorities investigating the case found in the young person's personal computer about 1 million of erotic videos and more 600,000 photographs of naked or semi-nude women. According to the lagoon of versions circulating around the case, the young man would have presented third degree burns in his hands, although the definitive cause of his death is not yet accurately determined.
